Description.Whereas: the Landlord agrees to lease, and the Tenant agrees to rent the property described herein under the terms and conditions set forth below, the parties hereby agree as follows:
Description.1. Description of Property:
The property is located at [Property Address].
The property includes [Describe any included furnishings or appliances].
Description.Term:
The lease term begins on [Start Date] and ends on [End Date], unless terminated earlier in accordance with this Agreement.
The Tenant has the option to [Renew/Not Renew] the lease upon expiration.
Description.Rent:
The monthly rent is [Insert Amount and Currency], payable on the [Insert Day] of each month.
Late payments may incur a penalty of [Insert Amount].
Description.Security Deposit:
The Tenant shall provide a security deposit of [Insert Amount] upon signing this Agreement.
The deposit will be returned within [Insert Time Period] after the lease ends, less any deductions for damages.
Description.Maintenance And Repairs:
The Landlord is responsible for repairs related to [Structural/Electrical/Plumbing Issues].
The Tenant is responsible for routine maintenance and minor repairs.
Description.Termination:
Either party may terminate this Agreement by providing [Insert Notice Period] written notice.
Termination due to breach must be preceded by written notice of the breach and a [Insert Time Period] cure period.
Description.Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through [Arbitration/Litigation] under the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction].
